pageSetting.title: 职能部室员工考核结果评价明细查询

sqlMap.select: /**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select distinct fapz.khnf, case when fapz.khzq=1 then '月' when fapz.khzq=2 then '季' else '年' end as khzq, case when fapz.khzq=1 then cast(zxpffa.khqs as char(8))|| '月' when fapz.khzq=2 then '第' ||cast(zxpffa.khqs as char(8))|| '季度' else cast(zxpffa.khqs as char(8))|| '年' end as khqs, khjg.jgdh, khjg.jgmc, hygw.gwmc, hy.hydh, hy.hymc, fapz.famc, wdmb.wdmc, khxmpz.xmmc, khpjbz.pjbz ,zxpfz.pf,hy2.hydh pjrdh,hy2.hymc pjrmc, zxpffa.py from znbs_zxpffa zxpffa inner join znbs_fapz fapz on zxpffa.fabh=fapz.fabh inner join khdx_hygw hygw on zxpffa.khdxdh=hygw.khdxdh and zxpffa.khqm between hygw.qsrq and hygw.jsrq inner join khdx_jg khjg on fapz.znbs =khjg.khdxdh inner join znbs_zxpfz zxpfz on zxpfz.fabh=zxpffa.fabh and zxpfz.khqs=zxpffa.khqs and zxpfz.pjr=zxpffa.pjr and zxpfz.khdxdh=zxpffa.khdxdh inner join znbs_khxmpz khxmpz on khxmpz.fabh=zxpfz.fabh and zxpfz.xmbh=khxmpz.xmbh left join znbs_khpjbz khpjbz on khpjbz.fabh= zxpfz.fabh and zxpfz.xmbh=khpjbz.xmbh and khxmpz.pjbh = khpjbz.pjbh and khpjbz.pjbzbh=zxpfz.pjbzbh inner join znbs_wdmb wdmb on wdmb.wdbh=khxmpz.wdbh inner join khdx_hy hy on zxpffa.khdxdh=hy.khdxdh inner join khdx_hy hy2 on zxpffa.pjr = hy2.khdxdh where 1=1 and fapz.khnf=$khnd$ and fapz.khzq=$khzq$ and zxpffa.khqs=$khqs$ and fapz.fabh =$fabh$ and zxpffa.khdxdh in ($khdxdh$) and zxpffa.khdx='2'and hygw.gwbh='$gwbh$' and zxpffa.pjr=$pjr$ order by wdmb.wdmc, khxmpz.xmmc

/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select count(1) from ( select distinct fapz.khnf, case when fapz.khzq=1 then '月' when fapz.khzq=2 then '季' else '年' end as khzq, case when fapz.khzq=1 then cast(zxpffa.khqs as char(8))|| '月' when fapz.khzq=2 then '第' ||cast(zxpffa.khqs as char(8))|| '季度' else cast(zxpffa.khqs as char(8))|| '年' end as khqs, khjg.jgdh, khjg.jgmc, hygw.gwmc, hy.hydh, hy.hymc, fapz.famc, wdmb.wdmc, khxmpz.xmmc, khpjbz.pjbz ,zxpfz.pf,hy2.hydh pjrdh,hy2.hymc pjrmc, zxpffa.py from znbs_zxpffa zxpffa inner join znbs_fapz fapz on zxpffa.fabh=fapz.fabh inner join khdx_hygw hygw on zxpffa.khdxdh=hygw.khdxdh and zxpffa.khqm between hygw.qsrq and hygw.jsrq inner join khdx_jg khjg on fapz.znbs =khjg.khdxdh inner join znbs_zxpfz zxpfz on zxpfz.fabh=zxpffa.fabh and zxpfz.khqs=zxpffa.khqs and zxpfz.pjr=zxpffa.pjr and zxpfz.khdxdh=zxpffa.khdxdh inner join znbs_khxmpz khxmpz on khxmpz.fabh=zxpfz.fabh and zxpfz.xmbh=khxmpz.xmbh left join znbs_khpjbz khpjbz on khpjbz.fabh= zxpfz.fabh and zxpfz.xmbh=khpjbz.xmbh and khxmpz.pjbh = khpjbz.pjbh and khpjbz.pjbzbh=zxpfz.pjbzbh inner join znbs_wdmb wdmb on wdmb.wdbh=khxmpz.wdbh inner join khdx_hy hy on zxpffa.khdxdh=hy.khdxdh inner join khdx_hy hy2 on zxpffa.pjr = hy2.khdxdh where 1=1 and fapz.khnf=$khnd$ and fapz.khzq=$khzq$ and zxpffa.khqs=$khqs$ and fapz.fabh =$fabh$ and zxpffa.khdxdh in ($khdxdh$) and zxpffa.khdx='2'and hygw.gwbh='$gwbh$' and zxpffa.pjr=$pjr$ order by wdmb.wdmc, khxmpz.xmmc ) t
